price: Today We will seal up their mouths, and their hands will speak to Us, and their feet will testify to all what they used to do.
arabic: ٱلۡيَوۡمَ نَخۡتِمُ عَلَىٰٓ أَفۡوَٰهِهِمۡ وَتُكَلِّمُنَآ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَتَشۡهَدُ أَرۡجُلُهُم بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
